
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/wikeflow/p/18902917" title="发布于 2025-05-29 17:27">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">2.3.net core 工作流WorkFlow流程（流程节点附件设置）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1 align="center">流程节点附件设置</h1>
<p>WikeFlow官网：<a href="http://www.wikesoft.com/" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="text-decoration: underline">http://www.wikesoft.com</span></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="p">有些流程要求某些节点必须上传附件。</p>
<p class="p"><span style="font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;">你只需要在流程节点中配置附件的</span>Key，附件名称，是否必传。</p>
<p class="p">如下图：</p>
<p class="p">&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1132363/202505/1132363-20250529172542370-575971820.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>&nbsp;文件存储</h2>
<p class="p"><span style="font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;">附件会上传到应用根目录下面的</span>Upload文件夹下面。</p>
<p class="p">&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>&nbsp; 流程引擎如何调用上传</h2>
<p class="p">FileUploadUrl：文件服务器地址</p>
<p class="p">FileAppName：应用名</p>
<p class="p">FileGroupName：分组名</p>
<p class="p">ImgCompressWidth：图片生成缩略图压缩的宽度</p>
<p class="p">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="p"><span style="font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;">如果出现文件能上传成功，无法下载或预览，请检查</span>FileUploadUrl地址是否与你的项目调试地址一样（包含端口号）。</p>
<p class="p"><span style="font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;">你的项目正式发布后，</span>FileUploadUrl的值要换成正式发布的Url地址。</p>
<h4><strong>1、.net framework版本只需要在web.config里面配置四个值 。</strong></h4>
<p class="p">&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1132363/202505/1132363-20250529172610605-408580135.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="p">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="p"><strong>2、.net core版本的配置在appsetting.json里面。</strong></p>
<p class="p">&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1132363/202505/1132363-20250529172630232-311190814.png" alt=""></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
